title: Why is Irelia strong even when behind???
body:
If i manage to solo kill her a few times she shouldn't be able to fight me as if we went even in lane...

Tell me if this has happened to you: You beat her in lane, some time passes she now has  {{item:3078}} she then goes mid or bot and then solo kills either your mid laner or your adc while being 0/4... 

Few minutes after that she's legendary...
